headline: TTEC Triumphs at ECCCSAs with Three Gold Awards and Industry Recognition Across Europe
summary: TTEC's winning team celebrates three gold wins at the 2025 European Contact Centre & Customer Service Awards. LONDON, Dec. 08, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- TTEC Holdings, Inc. (NASDAQ: TTEC), a leading global CX (customer experience) technology and services innovator for AI-enhanced CX, proudly announced its success at the 2025 European Contact Centre and Customer Service Awards (ECCCSAs), earning multiple honors and recognition across several categories. headline: Large M&A deals expected in 2026 despite continuing geopolitical strife
summary: Tariff jitters remain, but pent-up demand, rising stocks and stable interest rates are driving prospective buyers to pull the trigger on deals.
